value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|Laegjarn, I've been thinking...$k$pWhen this battle is over, can we try
speaking to your sister?$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|If that is what you wish... Very well.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Ninja22,Face|That is wise. Sisters mustn't fight for
too long!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ハール,ch11_14_Haar_M_Ninja22,Face|Speaking of "too long," can we get this
over with? There's only so much time
left in the day to nap.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者セルジュ,ch04_18_Serge_F_Ninja22,Face|And Minerva is going to miss her
snack unless we finish up soon!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ヒース,ch03_29_Heath_M_Ninja22,Face|All this sleeping and snacking... Tell
me again how you two managed to
become such proficient warriors?$k$pShow a little gumption!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|There you are.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|Sister! And Princess Fjorm...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|I feel that I may have wrong-footed
you.$k$pYou've been looking forward to
enjoying the ninja festival with
Laegjarn for a long time.$k$pAnd here I come, getting in the
middle of your big plans...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|I must apologize, my sister.$k$pI did not consider how much you
might be looking forward to spending
time together during the festival.$k$pWe had only ourselves for so long
that I took your feelings for granted.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|I think I must be wrong.$k$pI should be happy you made a friend.
Instead, I felt lonely.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|All younger sisters feel that way. I can
say that because I am one.$k$pI know I would feel the same if
Gunnthrá was off having fun
with her friends without me.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|You would?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, yes. Just the same as you do.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|Still, I should apologize.$k$pI am sorry for being so rude.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|It's all right. The thing that would
hurt me most is if you two never
made up with each other.$k$pDo you think we can all get along,
the three of us?$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Laevatein, you are my beloved sister,
and beyond that, you are the one I
treasure most in this world...$k$pKnow this: no matter how many
friends I make, you will forever
be my one and only sister.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|Thank you, Sister. I am sorry for my
actions before.$k$pPrincess Fjorm... Would you mind...if
I came along today?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|Not at all! Let's enjoy the festival as
a trio.$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|An excellent suggestion. Here, take
my hand. Princess Fjorm can take
the other.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|This is embarrassing.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|Hee-hee.$k$p$Sbs150|
